properties.name: 3 Monkeys, 1 bad shrimp . . .
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl2525 W. Main St. Richmond, VA4.1.07 note to self: never let the bartender upgrade your regular bloody to the one that has the shrimp hanging off the rim of the glass just because she feels bad for forgetting your order. i was violently ill the rest of the afternoon. so sad i had to cut short my much needed visit with Fadeproof Q and V-Lovely :( i miss those guys!
Posted by Worldgirl

properties.name: B'day Party in B'ham
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl Birmingham, AL2.3.07 a two-hour drive for a little fun with some old friends? why not. apparently, the three of us nearly finished the entire bottle of tequila. i woke up at 4:00 in the morning face-down on the bathroom floor, having lost both my shoes and my glasses. we finally found my shoes with Brooks\' pants in the main house. he was going commando. if i was there, i\'m glad i blacked out. just like old times!

properties.name: Bacchus
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl2 N Meadow St. Richmond, VA3.31.07 too many familiar faces whose names i\'ve long forgotten, but the cream and spinach penne was just like i remembered.

properties.name: Baronda
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl710 Peachtree St. NE Atlanta, GA2.09.07

properties.name: Chow Baby
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl1016 Howell Mill Rd. NW Atlanta, GA4.19.07 i\'m not really sure i\'m down with paying someone else to feed me, but having to make up the recipe for what they\'re cooking myself. for as much stir fry as i make at home, i apparently totally suck at the whole Mongolian barbeque thing. and i\'m definitely not down with unexpected house guests, though at least they paid for dinner. just wish i had had enough warning to at least run the vacuum and rinse the tub. oh well, at least one of them was family.

properties.name: Daegu, South Korea
properties.description: Posted by WorldgirlDaegu, South Korea4.28.07 my goodness, a long visit to the far east certainly seems to have a positive effect on some people. Ethan again. sober this time. just thinking about me he said on the voicemail, and very intent on relaying his entire travel schedule. i\'m still not entirely clear whether he arrives home today, tomorrow or Wednesday, but i\'m certainly interested to see what\'s next when he does . . .

properties.name: Dailey's Downstairs
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl17 Andrew Young International Blvd. Atlanta, GA3.15.07 wow, that second martini was such a BAD idea.4.3.07 god, this place is dangerous.4.05.07 after dinner drinks. this place is always trouble.5.16.07 i never thought it was possible to have just two drinks here! guess knowing i was meeting up with E and a business associate afterwards was enough motivation to keep me in line.

properties.name: Dark Horse Tavern
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl816 N Highland Ave Ne, Atlanta, GA4.20.07 oh, crap. did i give that guy my number? 4.22.07 yeah, i did. ugh.

properties.name: Dogwood Festival
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl10th St. At Monroe Dr, Atlanta, GA

properties.name: E finally cracks
properties.description: Posted by WorldgirlMunich, Germany4.20.07 why does he only seem to miss me when he\'s halfway across the world? yeah, he finally said it. and yeah, it was 4:00 in the morning over there and i\'m sure ein Bier oder zwõlf was involved.

properties.name: Eno
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl800 Peachtree St. Atlanta, GA3.23.07 i somehow have a knack for choosing the most expensive place, given several options. 0 to park (okay, so i paid for both our cars) because i was fed up with driving around. i knew we were in trouble when the board by the hostess stand was filled with hand-written 5 prix fixe dinner options. nonetheless, the patio was lovely, and our waiter successfully stifled his annoyance that we only split a cheaper bottle of wine and a bowl of (yummy!!) steamed mussels. would definitely love to try a real meal . . . maybe if i ever get a date. too bad i didn\'t end the evening there.

properties.name: Gibney's Pub
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl231 Peachtree St. NE Atlanta, GA2.15.07 god, these work things can be awkward. 3.1.07 another round!3.15.07 finally, a few new faces. but this place is getting old! 4.12.07 i am so boycotting the next one of these. surely there is someplace else to drink around here!

properties.name: Gordon Biersch
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl848 Peachtree St. NE Atlanta, GA3.23.06 really, who on earth drinks mojitos at a brewhouse?

properties.name: Grant Central Pizza
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl451 Cherokee Ave. Atlanta, GA4.13.07

properties.name: Harry & Sons
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl820 N. Highland Ave. Atlanta, GA4.20.07

properties.name: Las Margaritas
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl1842 Chesire Bridge Rd. NE Atlanta, GA4.17.07 fun! another girls\' night and an awesome patio. too bad it wasn\'t a little warmer.

properties.name: Limerick Junction
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl822 N. Highland Ave. NE Atlanta, GA3.14.07 watching the door . . . 4.20.07 should i have gone home after Neighbors and Harry\'s? of course. did i? of course not.

properties.name: Lincoln Towers
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl850 n. randolph st. arlington, va1.29.07 right here is where the whole sordid story began. my boyfriend of 7 years, Ethan, and i had been living in different cities since July, when i took a job in DC. his job search there never panned out and he landed in Atlanta, instead. it could have been SO much worse, considering that Wichita, for god\'s sake, was in the running at one point. so we\'d been talking about my moving down there since Labor Day when he got the offer. i was extremely lucky and got the first job i applied for, which just happened to be at a really well-known big company that was willing to pay me even more than i was making in DC. i knew E was having some hesitations about my moving because he wasn’t really feeling comfortable there yet, but the offer was too good to pass up. We decided i should take it and we would figure our stuff out. fast forward to the day the movers put every single thing i own in boxes and were coming back the next day to load it all on a truck and drive it to E’s apartment. i went out to celebrate over a few martinis with Nate and came home to call E. and that’s when he dropped the bomb. "I just don’t think we should live together.” he gave me some lame-ass excuse about doing it for the right reasons and not just because of job situations and I pretty much told him to fuck off. . .

properties.name: Munich International Airport
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl4.21.07 and then Ethan woke up, sobered up and decided his previous email was "irresponsible". he decided to tell me this right before he had to shut down his blackberry and fly to Tokyo, where said blackberry won\'t work. he imparted these technical details as explanation for not responding quickly to any messages i might send in response telling him what a jackass he is. here we go again . . .

properties.name: Neighbors
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl752-C N. Highland Ave. Atlanta, GA3.20.07

properties.name: New Hut
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl609 Virginia Ave. NE Atlanta, GA4.27.07 new digs make all the difference! the furniture didn\'t actually arrive for another week, but this new lease felt like a whole new lease on life. plus, i couldn\'t wait to hear Ethan\'s reaction when he heard i had up and moved without consulting him at all.

properties.name: Park Tavern
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl500 Tenth St. NE Atlanta, GA3.24.07

properties.name: Penny Lane Pub
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl421 E Franklin St. Richmond, VA3.30.07 oh, how i\'ve missed those little wooden chips that add up to free Harp! not nearly enough gossip time with His Grizzledness, though.

properties.name: Popkins Tavern
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl121 W. Broad St. Richmond, VA3.31.07 SO see and be seen, but where were all the cute boys? someone tangentially connected with our group sent my number to some guy he knows down here. so shocked that i haven\'t gotten a call ;) and i had the pleasure of meeting the brother of oysterboy. clearly, our meet-and-ditch the previous month hadn\'t been discussed.

properties.name: Ray's in the City
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl240 Peachtree St. Atlanta, GA4.3.07 yay for fun visitors from the RIC! yummy sushi and (finally!) a frank discussion about the havoc crazypants is wreaking in certain circles up there. also, finally, a confirmation on which influential men she\'s fucking. does good really win out over evil in the end?

properties.name: Residence Inn Atlanta Downtown
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl 134 Peachtree St NW Atlanta, GA1.31.07

properties.name: Rock Bottom Brewery
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl3242 Peachtree Rd. Atlanta, GA3.7.07

properties.name: Sala
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl1186 North Highland Ave. NE Atlanta, GA2.24.07 no ditching boys, no creepy oysters. just some divine margaritas and a yummy pork and black beans on a perfect patio. this was much more like it.

properties.name: The Highlander
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl931 Monroe Dr. Atlanta, GA2.9.07 my first official happy hour here. it was a good sign.2.23.07 it\'s happy hour again!5.4.07 so nice not to have to drive across town for cocktails aymore!

properties.name: The Independent
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl931 Monroe Dr. Atlanta, GA4.6.07 an extremely painful reminder that i am much better at drinking beer than playing darts. is it time for rehab yet? 5.4.07 the boys were none too pleased to hear about my plans to meet up with E the next day. how could they ever understand?

properties.name: The Office
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl235 Peachtree St. NE Atlanta, GA2.5.07

properties.name: The Palm
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl3391 Peachtree Road, NE Atlanta, GA5.16.07 too bad i was so late meeting up with Ethan. this could have been fun. so like old times, but with all the awkwardness of trying to impress someone new. his friend was nice enough, but clearly had no idea about our full history. not necessarily a bad thing . . .

properties.name: The Righteous Room
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl1051 Ponce de Leon Ave. Atlanta, GA5.12.07 no, he did not ask me what kind of ring i want. . . . oh yes, he did.

properties.name: The Standard
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl327 Memorial Dr. Atlanta, GA4.13.07 Friday the 13th! patio cocktails always ward off eviil spirits.

properties.name: Tokyo, Japan
properties.description: Posted by WorldgirlTokyo, Japan4.24.07 i knew the call was coming. i didn\'t know when, but i knew it would come. fewer cocktails preceded it than the email from Munich, but i could tell in his voice there had been a few. god, he leaves the longest messages that don\'t say a damn thing . . .

properties.name: UJoint
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl906 Oakview Rd. Decatur, GA3.9.07

properties.name: Valentine's Day
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl1016 Howell Mill Road NW, Atlanta GA2.14.07 home alone . . . though i could at least be proud that i hadn\'t made one stupid phone call in four days.

properties.name: Virginia Historical Society
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl428 North Boulevard Richmond, VA3.30.07 yeah, they really did shut down the bar for an hour during the show. the good news is that crazypants was nowhere to be seen . . . private party after kept me out of too much trouble and kinda-sorta feeling human the next day. but can you believe i heard yet another story about Ethan\'s philandering? why do people have to tell me this stuff?

properties.name: a place to lay my hat
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl1016 Howell Mill Road NW, Atlanta GA1.31.07 i still couldn\'t believe what Ethan had done and that i was here in Atlanta in my own apartment, and not getting settled into his. but maybe it was for the best. we could take things slow and choose a place together in a few months when he stopped freaking out.

properties.name: a walk in the park
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl 10th St. At Monroe Dr. Atlanta, GA5.6.07 should i have been surprised that Ethan postponed our Saturday catch up? i wasn\'t. he did come through Sunday, though, and showed up with the dogs as planned. and he was all kinds of kissy. a walk from one end of the park to the other and back was just enough time to catch up on his trip, our jobs and all the stuff that had happened in the past 3 months that was easy to talk about. the rest, that would take a little liquid courage, but the Tavern was closed for a private event . . .

properties.name: beers on the balcony
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl747 Ralph McGill Blvd. NE Atlanta, GA5.12.07 Ethan had done so much with the place since i\'d seen it 4 months ago, i could hardly believe it. and i was relieved to learn that the past week did not seem to have changed anything between us.

properties.name: here we go again
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl931 Monroe Dr. Atlanta, GA5.5.07 somewhere between the third and fifth (?) pitchers later, we both came to the conclusion that it was completely ridiculous not to stop all this nonsense and just get married. rings and children were discussed and timelines were thrown out. and i thought this time, he just might mean it. but how many times had i thought he meant it before? and not because he said all the right things, but because it had been 4 long, lonely months and i just wanted to, i slept with him. 5.6.07 i woke up and found his sunglasses and a text pleading the case for having more than one kid. did he really mean it this time?

properties.name: normalcy resumes
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl816 North Highland Ave. Atlanta, GA2.10.07 yeah, i was still mad. i\'d played it cool all week not even suggesting that we see each other. we were both slammed at work anyway. and Ethan was on best behavior, calling every night to see how the new job was going. by Saturday, i was ready to talk and get things back to normal. a nice catch up over several beers and everything seemed completely fine and normal, filling him in on everything new in my world the past week and gossiping about old friends. i was determined not to be that girl (again) and get into a drunken, tearful deep discussion at the bar about what the hell had happened 10 days earlier. i figured i could do that Sunday after brunch . . .

properties.name: not Azio
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl931 Monroe Dr. Atlanta, GA4.6.07 what a week. cutting out early was definitely necessary. luckily going away parties aren\'t mandatory and the regular crew headed to our usual barstools.

properties.name: oysters & boys in Buckhead
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl3041 Bolling Way NE Atlanta, GA2.24.07 i wasn\'t silly enough to think such a random set up by a girlfriend back in Richmond could turn into something. but i thought at least the guy would be polite. no joke, Melanie and i went up to the oyster roast to meet up with these guys and they kept ditching us like we were fatties or something. and they were the ones who were so completely random and boring. it was the most bizarre thing. so the third time we got separated, we just left. nothing ventured, nothing gained, i suppose.

properties.name: return to the scene of the crime
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl816 North Highland Ave. Atlanta, GA3.14.07 thankfully, quite an uneventful return, but a little weird, nonetheless, to be sitting down the bar from the next to last place i had seen E in over a month. but nothing a couple sauvingnon blancs couldn\'t right. 4.16.07 well, we made it full circle. can you believe he did not even remember where he\'d dropped his bomb 3 months earlier? boys! such a more pleasant evening this time. and it ended like the last one was supposed to--with us going home together and falling into bed.

properties.name: reunited, and it feels so  . . . weird
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl1016 Howell Mill Road NW, Atlanta GA2.3.07

properties.name: the other shoe drops
properties.description: Posted by Worldgirl832 N Highland Ave NE, Atlanta, GA2.10.07 . . . so he pays the tab and we leave. we walk down the street with our arms locked as usual, and as we near my car i confirm "it\'s cool if i stay over, right?" he hesitates. what the fuck? "well?" "i\'m not so sure that\'s a good idea." "what the fuck, Ethan?" he hesitates. "so 10 days ago, when you told me you didn\'t think we should live together, did you really mean we shouldn\'t date anymore, either?" "well, yeah, i guess." i was so not having that conversation after 6 Stellas in the middle of a well-trafficked parking lot on a Saturday night. seriously. much better to throw my ranting fit over the phone in the car driving back across town in a new city i wasn\'t familiar with. yeah, much better. could this really be my life?
